role.descr: entity being removed // exon, gene, chromosomal region, cell //

example.text: Study of the promoter-lacZ gene fusions introduced into the chromosome indicated that galS expression was elevated in cells in which the normal galS gene was interrupted, but not in cells in which the galR gene was deleted.

Mutation of the hns gene in E. coli has resulted in strong expression of the V. fischeri lux system at low cell density even in an rpoS deleted strain of E. coli that emits very low levels of luminescence.
example.arg: strain of E. coli that emits very low levels of luminescence

example.text: Studies with strains deleted for the micF locus showed that the marA-dependent reduction of OmpF required an intact micF locus.
